name: RecyCrab
description:
RecyCrab is a 2D top-down game made by Caio Aguiar, Vitor Amado and Matthews Gonçalves for the Weekly Game Jam #162. On the game you assume Mr. Crab who needs to clean his beach from the human's garbage after the summer season. Hope you enjoy it! 

If you have any advice, we will be happy to hear it.
